name: phpmlist
short_description:
MySQL / SQLite3 backend, fronted by a PHP interface in the browser. Very simple to configure and use and can be run on the most basic of commercial web servers if set up with SQLite3. Uses PEAR for mail distribution. Handles attachments and allows on-the-fly changes to generic unsubscribe information. 

Possibly the coolest feature is that recipients can unsubscribe themselves via a self-service mechanism. (And similarly, anybody can join the list by subscribing online.)
summary: PHP mailing list manager with attachments. Recipients can unsubscribe.
